summary.text: Full Stack web developer with a background in banking. Trained at University of Washington Coding Bootcamp & earned a certificate in full-stack web development. Versatile problem-solver excited about expanding knowledge; focused on adaptive design and development.Strengths in creativity, teamwork, and building projects effectively on all accounts.

education.title: Full Stack Development Certificate
education.overview: 24 week intensive program focused on gaining skills in front end and back end technologies

education.title: Bachelors of Science in Marketing
education.overview: Outstanding Marketing Award, Sandra Parks Marketing Award, Hederman Scholar

education.title: Business Program Certificate
education.school: Chung Yuan Christian University, Taipei, Taiwan
education.overview: 2 month program focused on gaining international business skills and adapting to new environments

experience.title: Suspicious Activity Investigator - BSA/AML
responsibilities: Streamlined operations by developing and implementing compliance procedures and guidelines for cross-functional operations teams, resulting in an increase in process efficiency and improved collaboration among departments.

Utilized critical thinking skills to evaluate risk levels of customer behavior, including transactional trends and historical statistics, effectively preventing money laundering and ensuring regulatory compliance.
Protected the company's reputation and financial well-being by leading investigations into system-wide suspicious activities.
accomplishments: Played a pivotal role as a liaison to newly acquired banks, driving successful training and transition processes.
Selected as a distinguished representative to attend the esteemed BSA/AML Conference, showcasing the Bank's commitment to regulatory compliance and industry best practices.

experience.title: CIP/QA Analyst and Regulatory Specialist
responsibilities: Demonstrated effective communication and interpersonal skills, fostering a collaborative environment and enhancing team cohesion.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze customer accounts, ensuring compliance with federal regulations and fostering a strong attention to detail.
Successfully identified and reported counterfeit money incidents, showcasing the ability to detect anomalies and contribute to risk management efforts.
accomplishments: Played a key role in the education department, contributing to employee training and onboarding during two company mergers
Selected for assisting in designing and delivering training materials, ensuring seamless knowledge transfer and a smooth transition for new employees.

projects.title: Wear You Wander
projects.overview: As Team Lead for this project, I assigned tasks, created the concept of the application, brand design & logo, worked with the Shuttershock API and Visual Crossing API, and integrated the team’s work to ensure acceptance criteria was met.

projects.title: Cheers Check
projects.overview: As Team Lead for this project, I assigned tasks, created the concept, functionality, & styling of the application, created the powerpoint presentation, & integrated the team’s code to produce a successfully functioning application. All Acceptance Criteria was met for this project.

projects.title: TasteBuds
projects.overview: As a Team Member, I ensured app functionality and that acceptance criteria was met, as well as, created the concept & design of the application and integrated the front to the backend.
